ENCRYPTION_ALGORITHM.description: Algorithm for the data encryption (like Tokens)

ENCRYPTION_KEY.description: Set a 32-chars key for the encryption. Please don't leave default value. http://www.unit-conversion.info/texttools/random-string-generator/

APIAI_TOKEN.description: Enables Hubot integration with Dialogflow (ex api.ai)

GITHUB_APP_ID.description: ID of the registered Github App

GITHUB_PEM.description: GitHub App's Private Key in text format

GITHUB_PEM_DIR.description: Directory of Github App private key file (.pem)

GITHUB_WEBHOOK_SECRET.description: If you use webhook secret, enter here the secret string.

GITHUB_APP_CLIENT_ID.description:
Needed for user authentication (OAuth). 
Can be found at the botton of your registered GitHub App settings page

GITHUB_APP_CLIENT_SECRET.description:
Needed for user authentication (OAuth). 
Can be found at the botton of your registered GitHub App settings page

HUBOT_HOST_URL.description: Full url of the bot. Heroku example: https://<app name>.herokapp.com

HUBOT_TRELLO_KEY.description: Located in the first box here: https://trello.com/app-key

HUBOT_TRELLO_TEAM.description: Trello Team shortName. Located in settings of your team

HUBOT_EMAIL.description: An email account for hubot and standup reports function. (tested: outlook, gmail)

STANDUPS_EMAIL.description: a preconfigure email for sending standups reports
